name: UIDocumentPickerExtensionViewController
desc: The principal class for the Document Picker View Controller extension.

items.name: var documentStorageURL: URL?
items.desc: The root URL for documents provided by the corresponding File Provider extension. (read-only)

items.name: var originalURL: URL?
items.desc: The URL of the file to be exported. (read-only)

items.name: func prepareForPresentation(in: UIDocumentPickerMode)
items.desc: Performs any custom configuration of the document picker view controller.

items.name: var providerIdentifier: String
items.desc: An identifier shared by this Document Picker extension and its corresponding File Provider extension. (read-only)

items.name: var validTypes: [String]?
items.desc: An array of valid uniform type identifiers.
